title: Taxi Training
subtitle: Professional taxi driver training and certification

hero.title: Become a Certified Taxi Driver
hero.description: Our comprehensive taxi training program prepares you for a successful career as a professional taxi driver in Sweden. Learn all the essential skills, regulations, and local knowledge needed.

overview.title: Training Overview
overview.description: Our taxi training covers everything you need to become a licensed taxi driver, including vehicle handling, customer service, navigation, and legal requirements.

modules.title: Traffic Regulations
modules.description: Comprehensive knowledge of Swedish traffic laws and taxi-specific regulations

modules.title: Local Geography
modules.description: Detailed knowledge of local areas, landmarks, and optimal routes

modules.title: Customer Service
modules.description: Professional interaction skills and customer satisfaction techniques

modules.title: Vehicle Handling
modules.description: Safe driving techniques and vehicle maintenance basics

modules.title: Emergency Procedures
modules.description: How to handle emergencies and difficult situations

modules.title: Technology Systems
modules.description: Using taxi meters, GPS systems, and booking applications

certification.title: Certification Process
certification.description: Upon successful completion of our training program, you'll receive official certification to work as a taxi driver in Sweden.

booking.title: Start Your Taxi Training
booking.description: Ready to begin your career as a professional taxi driver? Contact us to learn more about our training program and enrollment.
